text: Akhira ke karana cha ki allahako margama, ti nihsahaya logne manisaharu, ra svasni manisaharu ra baccaharu mukta gara'unaka lagi timi yud'dha gardainau? Jasale prarthana garne gardachan ki he raba! Hamila'i atyacariharuko saharabata nikalihala ra hamro nimti aphna visesa raksaka niyukta gara ra hamro nimti khasa aphnaitarphabata sahayogi bana'ide'u
